name: Growth Industries
description:
Congratulations for being accepted to your 1 week employment trial at Growth Industries, Incorporated. Growing better people is our business! We use the latest advances in nutrient delivery technology to ensure customers will be completely satisfied with our product. At Growth Industries we like to keep humans in the loop, so welcome aboard, and good luck!

UPDATES
- Post-jam version with minor fixes now available!
- Mac and Linux builds now available (not tested)

CONTROLS
- Click buttons with mouse or use keys 1-6 to dispense nutrients.
- HINT: You can also click on the nutrient dispensers themselves (top of screen)

TEAM NINJA THUMBS
- Moritz Schlitter (@momoschli): Art
- Steve Salmond (@stevesalmond): Code, Sound

LINKS
Ludum Dare Entry page
